Title: The Other Side
Description: We've finally figured out the placement of the third stone--and ye get to do the honors! I've affixed the stone to what's left of the watcher's staff. Just climb the scaffolding there, hold it up, and watch the show!
ObjectivesText: Open the door with the watcher staff.

Objectives.Text: Ascend the scaffolding to the location of the third watcher
